sourcesContent:
"use client"
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, Navigate } from "react-router-dom"
import { AuthProvider, useAuth } from "./context/AuthContext"
import { AnimatePresence, motion } from "framer-motion" // Import framer-motion

import Login from "./pages/Login"
import Signup from "./pages/Signup"
import Home from "./pages/Home"
import Marketplace from "./pages/Marketplace"
import GovernmentSchemes from "./pages/GovernmentSchemes"
import ExpertTalk from "./pages/ExpertTalk"

// Protected route component
const ProtectedRoute = ({ children }) => {
  const { isAuthenticated } = useAuth()

  if (!isAuthenticated) {
    return <Navigate to="/login" />
  }

  return children
}

function App() {
  return (
    <AuthProvider>
      <Router>
        <AnimatePresence exitBeforeEnter> {/* Ensure exit animations happen before entering new page */}
          <Routes>
            <Route path="/login" element={<Login />} />
            <Route path="/signup" element={<Signup />} />
            <Route
              path="/"
              element={
                <ProtectedRoute>
                  <PageWrapper>
                    <Home />
                  </PageWrapper>
                </ProtectedRoute>
              }
            />
            <Route
              path="/marketplace"
              element={
                <ProtectedRoute>
                  <PageWrapper>
                    <Marketplace />
                  </PageWrapper>
                </ProtectedRoute>
              }
            />
            <Route
              path="/government-schemes"
              element={
                <ProtectedRoute>
                  <PageWrapper>
                    <GovernmentSchemes />
                  </PageWrapper>
                </ProtectedRoute>
              }
            />
            <Route
              path="/expert-talk"
              element={
                <ProtectedRoute>
                  <PageWrapper>
                    <ExpertTalk />
                  </PageWrapper>
                </ProtectedRoute>
              }
            />
          </Routes>
        </AnimatePresence>
      </Router>
    </AuthProvider>
  )
}

// Wrapper component to animate pages
const PageWrapper = ({ children }) => {
  return (
    <motion.div
      initial={{ opacity: 0 }} // Initial opacity 0 for the entering page
      animate={{ opacity: 1 }} // Animate to opacity 1
      exit={{ opacity: 0 }} // Exit with opacity 0
      transition={{ duration: 0.5 }} // Transition duration (you can adjust this)
    >
      {children}
    </motion.div>
  )
}

export default App
